## Announcement of a Sealed-Bid Auction
### Auction No. (2461)
The Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> announces the sale of computers, iPads, UPS devices, printers, computer screens, photocopiers, keyboards, and other miscellaneous materials out of service from the General Fire Force <orig>قوة الإطفاء العام</orig> by sealed-bid auction, according to the following details:
1- **Location for receiving the terms booklet and participation offer:** General Fire Force <orig>قوة الإطفاء العام</orig> – West Mishref – Main Building – Second Floor – Financial Affairs Department – Revenues Section – Room No. (227), from 20/4/2025 to 24/4/2025. The documents will be handed over for a non-refundable fee of (30) Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>ديناراً كويتياً</orig>, to be paid at the General Fire Force <orig>قوة الإطفاء العام</orig> cashier.
The bidder will sign an acknowledgment and pledge upon receiving the terms booklet to adhere to the specified deadline for submitting the bid to the Central Sales Committee at the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig>.
2- **Inspection Date:** (5) working days, from 20/4/2025 to 24/4/2025. Inspection Time: During official working hours.
3- **Location for receiving those wishing to inspect:** Al-Rai Workshops Complex – Dirt Yard Warehouse
4- **Date and location for submitting bids and opening envelopes:**
- Bids are to be submitted on Sunday, 27/4/2025, at the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> – Ministries Complex – Block 12 – Third Floor – General Warehousing Affairs Department – Central Sales Section, according to the time specified for the bidder by the General Fire Force <orig>قوة الإطفاء العام</orig> (No bid will be accepted after the bidder's specified deadline has passed).
- Envelopes will be opened and the auction held on Monday, 28/4/2025, at the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> – Ministries Complex – Block 12 – Third Floor – General Warehousing Affairs Department.
- The winning bidder will be announced on the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> website on Monday, 28/4/2025.
- Checks will be returned to the unsuccessful bidders on Tuesday, 29/4/2025.
- Certified checks / bank guarantees must be made out in the name of the General Fire Force <orig>قوة الإطفاء العام</orig>.

### Special Conditions for the Auction:
- The bidder must be a Kuwaiti establishment or company registered in the Commercial Register and with the Kuwait Chamber of Commerce and Industry <orig>غرفة تجارة وصناعة الكويت</orig>. A foreigner may participate provided they have a Kuwaiti partner or agent who is a merchant under a notarized contract. (The following must be attached: a copy of the Chamber of Commerce and Industry certificate, a copy of the company license, and a letter of authorization certified by the Chamber of Commerce and Industry, all of which must be valid).
- To receive the auction terms booklet: Please contact Lieutenant Colonel / Saad Al-Omair <orig>سعد العمير</orig>, Tel: 95005050
- Auction inspection site official: Engineer / Mohammed Abdeen <orig>محمد عابدين</orig>, Tel: 95590092
- Rapporteur of the Central Sales Committee at the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> / Tel: (22481979)
- Website address: www.mof.gov.kw

# Ministry of Communications <orig>وزارة المواصلات</orig>
## Announcement
### Tender for Auction 2024/3/2025
License for the use of a space designated for a bank (Site B) in the East Wing on the ground floor of the Government Mall building in the Telecommunications Complex and Liberation Tower for a period of (3) years
The Ministry of Communications <orig>وزارة المواصلات</orig> announces Tender No. 2024/3/2025 in accordance with the following conditions and details:

<table_caption>Tender Details for Ministry of Communications License (No. 2024/3/2025)</table_caption>
<table>
| Tender | Requesting Authority | Fee Value | Closing Date | Initial Deposit |
|:---|:---|:---|:---|:---|
| 20/4/2025 | Ministry of Communications <orig>وزارة المواصلات</orig> | 75 K.D. | 8/5/2025 | Not less than (2%) and not more than (5%) of the bid value |
</table>

<table_caption>Preliminary Meeting Schedule</table_caption>
<table>
| Preliminary Meeting |
|:---|
| Wednesday, 23/4/2025 at 9:00 AM in the Liberation Tower building, first floor |
</table>

To obtain the tender documents, please visit the headquarters of the Ministry of Communications <orig>وزارة المواصلات</orig> in the Shuwaikh area – Jamal Abdul Nasser Street – Building No. (2), Third Floor – Purchasing and Warehousing Department – Tenders Monitoring Office, to receive the tender documents booklet during official working hours.
- The bid validity period is (90) days from the date of bid opening. The initial deposit shall be not less than (2%) and not more than (5%) of the bid value, in the form of a certified check or a letter of guarantee from an approved local bank in Kuwait, valid for the duration of the bid and issued in the name of the Ministry of Communications <orig>وزارة المواصلات</orig>.
- Companies wishing to participate must adhere to the following:
1- Provide a letter of authorization from the company to purchase the documents.
2- Provide a valid clearance certificate for the Ministry.
3- Provide a clearance certificate from the Ministry of Electricity, Water, and Renewable Energy.
4- Provide the national labor percentage certificate.
5- Provide a copy of the commercial license.
6- Provide a copy of registration with the Kuwait Chamber of Industry.
7- Provide a copy of registration with the Public Authority for Civil Information <orig>الهيئة العامة للمعلومات المدنية</orig>.
8- Provide a copy of the company's articles of association.
9- Provide the tax certificate from the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig>.
10- Provide a registration certificate from the Central Agency for Public Tenders <orig>الجهاز المركزي للمناقصات العامة</orig>.
11- Provide a certificate from the Central Agency for Information Technology <orig>الجهاز المركزي لتكنولوجيا المعلومات</orig>.
Bids for the auction are to be deposited in the designated box located at the Tenders and Practices Section headquarters – Shuwaikh – Building No. (2), Third Floor, until the end of Thursday, 8/5/2025, at 1:00 PM. All bidders must submit their bids in a sealed envelope with red wax, clearly marked with the auction number and subject.

Bids must be submitted starting from 9:00 AM until 2:00 PM on the closing date. Bids must be delivered in envelopes sealed with red wax and placed in the designated box for tenders at the Authority's headquarters (Second Floor). Any bids received after the specified deadline for the tender closing will not be accepted.
- Bidders must adhere to the instructions for submitting bids (CD) on the Public Authority for Sport's <orig>الهيئة العامة للرياضة</orig> website (Pas.gov.kw/tenders).
- Companies/bidders wishing to submit inquiries, clarifications, etc., must do so at the time and place specified in the table above for the preliminary meeting (inquiry session). No inquiries will be considered after the deadline.
- All documents must be submitted on a (CD) and a non-reproducible hard copy, except for the bid form and the initial guarantee, which must be submitted as a hard copy.
- Bids shall be valid for a period of (90) ninety days from the date of bid opening. Any bid not accompanied by the original or a copy of the receipt for the purchase of the tender documents, the initial guarantee, and the national labor support certificate issued by the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig> for the year 2025 will be excluded.
- The bidder must attach a valid 'To Whom It May Concern' certificate issued by the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig> stating that there are no holds on the bidder's file regarding government contracts registered with the Authority, nor any of the violations mentioned in Article (10) of Law No. 8 of 2010 concerning work in the private sector. Please note that any bid that does not include this certificate will be excluded.
- The bidder must attach a valid 'To Whom It May Concern' certificate issued by the Ministry of Electricity, Water, and Renewable Energy stating clearance of consumption debts.
- The tender is open to all companies and institutions specialized in the required works and registered with the Public Authority for Sport <orig>الهيئة العامة للرياضة</orig> and the Central Agency for Public Tenders <orig>الجهاز المركزي للمناقصات العامة</orig> for the year 2025, for a fee of (75 K.D.) only seventy-five Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>, payable via K-Net (non-refundable except in cases stipulated by the Ministry of Finance circulars), accompanied by the following: –
  1- A copy of the tender announcement in the Official Gazette.
  2- A copy of the company's registration with the Authority for the year 2025.
  3- A written authorization letter approved by the Authority, accompanied by (a copy of the Civil ID and a copy of the signature authorization).
- Owners of small and medium enterprises are exempt from the fees for purchasing the tender documents in accordance with the provisions of Article (39) of Law No. 74/2019 regarding amendments to the Public Tenders Law No. (49/2016).
- Owners of small and medium enterprises wishing to apply for the tender must attach to their bid a valid certificate issued by the National Fund for Small and Medium Enterprise Development <orig>الصندوق الوطني لرعاية وتنمية المشروعات الصغيرة والمتوسطة</orig>, confirming their accreditation as a small or medium enterprise, in accordance with the provisions of Article (48) of the Public Tenders Law No. (49 of 2016), which states, "Bid envelopes shall be opened at the time and place specified in the tender documents in a public session in the presence of the bidders or their representatives."
- This announcement serves as an invitation for interested bidders to attend. Companies wishing to attend the bid opening session have the right to coordinate with the competent committee before the day of the session.
- This announcement is an integral part of the tender documents.
- Note: The Authority may cancel the tender without stating reasons and without any objection from the bidders.
- For more information, please visit the website of the Public Authority for Sport <orig>الهيئة العامة للرياضة</orig> (Pas.gov.kw).

**Tender of Construction, Completion, Furnishing, Maintenance and Operation of KDIPA Headquarters Building**
**A Brief Summary of the Project**
The site location for KDIPA headquarter building planned to be built is: Plot (55), Block (2) of Sharq Area, Kuwait City PACI No. (96381329) as shown in the image hereunder.
Shabaan Mosque is located to the east – northeast directly adjacent to the site, with Abdullah Al Ahmad Street (1st Ring Road) to the north. Its frontage has a secondary slip road bordering along the entire north edge.
An open area located to the west and southwest will be used for future development. That is separated from KDIPA headquarter site by a future service road.
There are also open areas to the southeast, south and southwest that will be used later for future development.
The Plot area is 3,960 square meters. The Total Built-up area of the building is about 110,000 square meters, and the building height is 275 meters.

### Company's Head Office
#### Article (2)
The company's head office and domicile are in the State of Kuwait <orig>دولة الكويت</orig>. The owner of the capital may move it to any other location within the State of Kuwait, and may also establish branches and agencies for the company inside and outside the State of Kuwait. This office is considered the legal domicile of the company, which shall be used for directing correspondence and judicial notices to the company. Its details shall be recorded in the Commercial Register <orig>السجل التجاري</orig>, and any change to this domicile shall not be recognized until it is recorded in the Commercial Register <orig>السجل التجاري</orig>.

### Duration of the Company
#### Article (3)
The duration of the company's contract is 20 years, commencing from the date of notarization of the company's contract. This period may be extended before its expiration by a decision from the owner of the company's capital. If no decision for extension is issued and the company continues to conduct its business, the company's duration shall be automatically extended each time for a period similar to that mentioned in the contract and under the same terms.

## Management and Signing Authority
### Article (6)
The company shall be managed by the owner of the capital, by himself if he is a natural person, or by his representative if he is a legal entity.

<table_caption>Manager's Personal and Shareholder Information</table_caption>
<table>
| Mr. | Nationality | ID Number | Partner / Non-Partner | Address |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| Amr Haitham Hussein Bibi <orig>عمرو هيثم حسين بيبي</orig> | Kuwaiti | 280110301364 | Non-partner | Kuwait |
</table>

He may appoint one or more managers to represent the company before the judiciary and third parties, and the manager(s) shall be responsible for its management before the owner. The decision to appoint a manager shall not be effective until it is registered in the Commercial Register <orig>السجل التجاري</orig>.

### Article (7)
The manager shall represent the company in its relations with third parties and before the judiciary and shall have the broadest authority to act in its name and to conclude all contracts and transactions falling within the company's objectives. This includes, in particular, appointing, suspending, and dismissing the company's agents and employees; determining their salaries, wages, and bonuses; receiving and paying sums; signing, transferring, and concluding all contracts, agreements, and deals related to the company's transactions and the achievement of its objectives, whether in cash or on credit; and authorizing whomever he wishes with all or some of the management powers. (Unless the manager is appointed and his powers are specified in the company's contract or in the resolution issued by the owner of the capital appointing him). He shall have the right to open bank accounts.

The company's manager shall exercise his powers and competencies with the diligence of a prudent person.

The manager shall be jointly and severally liable towards the company or third parties for any violation of the provisions of the law, the provisions of these articles of association, or for mismanagement, in accordance with the rules stipulated in the chapter on joint-stock companies in the Companies Law No. 1 of 2016 <orig>قانون الشركات رقم 1 لسنة 2016</orig>, as amended by Law No. 15 of 2017, and its executive regulations.

The company's manager may not manage another competing company or one with similar objectives, nor may he contract with the company for his own account or for the account of others, except with permission issued by

## The Ordinary General Assembly
### Article (8)
The owner of the capital shall have competence in the following matters:
1. Amending the company's contract.
2. Dissolving and liquidating the company.
3. Merging, converting, or dividing the company.
4. Increasing or decreasing the company's capital.
5. Dismissing the company's manager or restricting his authority.

Taking into account the provisions for merger, conversion, and division stipulated in the Companies Law No. 1 of 2016 <orig>قانون الشركات رقم 1 لسنة 2016</orig>, as amended by Law No. 15 of 2017, and its executive regulations, the preceding resolutions shall be executed by their registration in the Commercial Register <orig>السجل التجاري</orig> without the need to be formalized in an official document.

## Company Accounts
### Article (9)
The company's fiscal year shall begin in January and end in December of each year, with the exception of the first fiscal year, which shall begin on the date of the company's registration in the Commercial Register <orig>السجل التجاري</orig> and end on the date set for the end of the following fiscal year.

## Dissolution and Liquidation of the Company
### Article (10)
The company shall also be dissolved—in a manner not inconsistent with the nature of a one-person company—for any of the reasons stipulated in the Companies Law No. 1 of 2016 <orig>قانون الشركات رقم 1 لسنة 2016</orig>, as amended by Law No. 15 of 2017, and its executive regulations.

The dissolution of the company must be publicized, and the dissolution shall not be effective against third parties until the date of its publicization.

The company's manager must follow up on the implementation of this procedure.

### Article (11)
The company's assets shall be liquidated upon its dissolution for any reason, in accordance with the provisions contained in the Companies Law No. 1 of 2016 <orig>قانون الشركات رقم 1 لسنة 2016</orig>, as amended by Law No. 15 of 2017, and its executive regulations.

### Article (12)
The owner shall be liable with his personal assets for the company's obligations in the following cases:
a) If he, in bad faith, liquidates it or ceases its activity before the end of its term or before achieving the purpose for which it was established.
b) If he fails to separate his personal financial liability from the company's financial liability.
c) If he conducts business on behalf of the company before it acquires legal personality.

### Article (13)
All papers, contracts, publications, advertisements, correspondence, and other documents issued by the company must bear its trade name, a statement of its legal form, its registration number in the Commercial Register <orig>السجل التجاري</orig>, a statement of the amount of its capital and the paid-up portion thereof, and be followed by the phrase "One-Person Company (O.P.C.)" <orig>شركة الشخص الواحد (ش.ش.و)</orig>.

### Article (14)
The company shall be subject—in matters not mentioned in these articles of association—to the provisions of the Companies Law No. 1 of 2016 <orig>قانون الشركات رقم 1 لسنة 2016</orig>, as amended by Law No. 15 of 2017, and its executive regulations.

### Article (15)
An original copy of this contract shall be kept at the company's head office and on its website.

# Kuwait Credit Bank <orig>بنك الائتمان الكويتي</orig>
## Announcement
Kuwait Credit Bank <orig>بنك الائتمان الكويتي</orig> announces the re-issuance of Tender No. (40-2025/2024) for the maintenance and upgrade of the electronic portal system for all branches of Kuwait Credit Bank <orig>بنك الائتمان الكويتي</orig>. Interested parties wishing to submit their bids should contact the bank to purchase the booklet of terms and technical specifications for the aforementioned tender, according to the details specified below:

**Conditions of the Submitted Bid**
The bidder must submit a technical offer and a financial offer in two sealed envelopes, one for the technical offer and the other for the financial offer, ensuring a copy of the bid is included on a flash memory drive, in accordance with the following conditions:
The technical envelope must contain the following:
- A preliminary guarantee in the form of a letter of guarantee for the amount of (2,000 K.D.) "only two thousand Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>", unconditional, free of any reservations, and irrevocable, issued by one of the approved banks in the State of Kuwait in the name of and for the benefit of Kuwait Credit Bank <orig>بنك الائتمان الكويتي</orig>. This guarantee must be valid for at least three months from the last date for receiving bids. Any bid not accompanied by this full guarantee will be excluded. Preliminary guarantees shall not be returned until after the passage of (90) ninety days from the tender closing date or when the winning bidder submits the final guarantee and signs the contract, unless the tender is canceled. Kuwait Credit Bank <orig>بنك الائتمان الكويتي</orig> will not pay any interest on the amount of this guarantee, and the bidder's creditors may not seize its amount.
- General and special conditions and technical data of the submitted offer.
